mention.text: Ukraine crisis CEO Energy giant Exxon Mobil Corp s drilling operations in Russia , as well as its alliance with Russian oil company Rosneft , have not been affected by the Ukrainian crisis or sanctions
Exxon Chief Executive Officer Rex Tillerson
the company s annual shareholder meeting
the sanctions against Russian individuals , including Rosneft head Igor Sechin
its views of the sanctions known to the US government
its net holdings in Rosneft joint-venture agreements for the Kara and Black seas
